backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles and contact form submissions with admin/user authorization and sortable retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing files and components involved in adding and displaying a CSC ID across the site.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of all major frontend pages, components, content modules, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicon, and the root element for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with root layout and routes for Home, About, Services, and Contact pages.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: React contact form with validation, submission via React Query, and success/error alert states.
frontend/src/components/MapEmbed.tsx: Google Maps iframe embed displaying the business address from centralized business info.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCard.tsx: UI card component rendering a service with icon, title, and description.
frontend/src/components/ServiceIcon.tsx: Maps string icon identifiers to Lucide React icons for service display.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer showing business info including phone, address, VLE, and CSC ID with navigation and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo, navigation links, phone CTA, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, footer, and WhatsApp button, providing a full-page layout.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Floating WhatsApp contact button linking to the business WhatsApp number.
frontend/src/content/business.ts: Exports basic business details including name, owner, phone, WhatsApp number, and address.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines service interface and a list of service entries with titles, descriptions, and icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context and helpers for login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a contact form submission mutation using the backend actor and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and utility extensions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero section, business description, and values cards.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the Contact page with a hero section, business contact details, cards, and a contact form plus map embed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the Home page with a hero, CTA buttons, and a features section highlighting service benefits.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a hero section and a grid of ServiceCard components populated from the services content list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, containers, radii, animations, and theme settings for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing site requirements, implemented features, branding rules, and architectural notes.
